description:
News, Rhode Island: Gardasil Lawsuit Claims HPV Vaccine Caused Teen Severe Injuries

""The national law firm of Baum Hedlund Aristei & Goldman filed a Gardasil lawsuit against Merck today on behalf of a 19-year-old woman, alleging the company misled the FDA, legislators, doctors and moms about the safety and efficacy of its Gardasil vaccine. The lawsuit asserts Merck purposely downplayed the risk of Gardasilâ€™s ingredients, including a proprietary aluminum compound (a potent neurotoxin) and secret and potentially hazardous DNA particles.""
https://www.baumhedlundlaw.com/8-20-gardasil-lawsuit-hpv-vaccine-injury/
